articles.description: Zendaya, 24, turned heads in a gorgeous purple dress inspired by Beyoncé's 2003 BET Awards look. She's nominated at the 2021 edition of the award show for Best Actress.
articles.content:
She regularly turns heads at award show red carpets thanks to her chic ensembles.
And Zendaya didn't disappointed on Sunday afternoon when she prepared for the 2021 BET Awards with a revealing purpl… [+5194 chars]
